title: Sync: Memory violation on Raspberry Pi 4b

milestone.title: v1.58
milestone.description:
Due date shifted 16.01.2022 -> 28.02.2022 by @ivandeex on 13.01.2022
cc @ncw

body:
<!--

We understand you are having a problem with rclone; we want to help you with that!

**STOP and READ**
**YOUR POST WILL BE REMOVED IF IT IS LOW QUALITY**:
Please show the effort you've put into solving the problem and please be specific.
People are volunteering their time to help! Low effort posts are not likely to get good answers!

If you think you might have found a bug, try to replicate it with the latest beta (or stable).
The update instructions are available at https://rclone.org/commands/rclone_selfupdate/

If you can still replicate it or just got a question then please use the rclone forum:

    https://forum.rclone.org/

for a quick response instead of filing an issue on this repo.

If nothing else helps, then please fill in the info below which helps us help you.

**DO NOT REDACT** any information except passwords/keys/personal info.

You should use 3 backticks to begin and end your paste to make it readable.

Make sure to include a log obtained with '-vv'.

You can also use '-vv --log-file bug.log' and a service such as https://pastebin.com or https://gist.github.com/

Thank you

The Rclone Developers

-->

#### The associated forum post URL from `https://forum.rclone.org`

None

#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?

An apparently valid call leads to memory violations

#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)

rclone v1.57.0
- os/version: raspbian 10.10
- os/kernel: 5.10.52-v7l+ (armv7l)
- os/type: linux
- os/arch: arm
- go/version: go1.17.2
- go/linking: static
- go/tags: none

#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (e.g. Windows 7, 64 bit)

Linux, Raspberry Pi 4b, ARM7l

#### Which cloud storage system are you using? (e.g. Google Drive)

Microsoft Blob Storage

#### The command you were trying to run (e.g. `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

rclone-v1.57.0-linux-arm-v7/rclone sync -vv test/ porkvision:/

#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (e.g. output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

```
2021/11/16 11:40:40 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.57.0" starting with parameters ["rclone-v1.57.0-linux-arm-v7/rclone" "sync" "-vv" "test/" "porkvision:/"]
2021/11/16 11:40:40 DEBUG : Creating backend with remote "test/"
2021/11/16 11:40:40 DEBUG : Using config file from "/home/pi/.config/rclone/rclone.conf"
2021/11/16 11:40:40 DEBUG : fs cache: renaming cache item "test/" to be canonical "/home/pi/test"
2021/11/16 11:40:40 DEBUG : Creating backend with remote "porkvision:/"
2021/11/16 11:40:40 DEBUG : fs cache: renaming cache item "porkvision:/" to be canonical "porkvision:"
panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x1 addr=0x10 pc=0x56e308]

goroutine 32 [running]:
github.com/Azure/azure-storage-blob-go/azblob.blockBlobClient.CommitBlockList({{{{0x0, 0x0}, {0x0, 0x0}, 0x0, {0x0, 0x0}, {0x376dd70, 0x7}, {0x0, ...}, ...}, ...}}, ...)
	github.com/Azure/azure-storage-blob-go@v0.14.0/azblob/zz_generated_block_blob.go:82 +0x2f4
github.com/Azure/azure-storage-blob-go/azblob.BlockBlobURL.CommitBlockList({{{{{...}, {...}}}}, {{{{...}, {...}, 0x0, {...}, {...}, {...}, 0x0, {...}, ...}, ...}}}, ...)
	github.com/Azure/azure-storage-blob-go@v0.14.0/azblob/url_block_blob.go:120 +0x1c0
github.com/Azure/azure-storage-blob-go/azblob.(*copier).close(0x34b01c0)
	github.com/Azure/azure-storage-blob-go@v0.14.0/azblob/chunkwriting.go:186 +0x118
github.com/Azure/azure-storage-blob-go/azblob.copyFromReader({0x180d580, 0x36f0f00}, {0x17f501c, 0x351efd0}, {0x1807564, 0x34f0280}, {{0x180d760, 0x37fa1f0}, 0x0, 0x400000, ...})
	github.com/Azure/azure-storage-blob-go@v0.14.0/azblob/chunkwriting.go:64 +0x24c
github.com/Azure/azure-storage-blob-go/azblob.UploadStreamToBlockBlob({0x180d580, 0x36f0f00}, {0x17f501c, 0x351efd0}, {{{{{...}, {...}}}}, {{{{...}, {...}, 0x0, {...}, ...}, ...}}}, ...)
	github.com/Azure/azure-storage-blob-go@v0.14.0/azblob/highlevel.go:553 +0xf0
github.com/rclone/rclone/backend/azureblob.(*Object).Update.func1()
	github.com/rclone/rclone/backend/azureblob/azureblob.go:1680 +0x200
github.com/rclone/rclone/fs.pacerInvoker(0x1, 0x1, 0x397e3f0)
	github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/pacer.go:88 +0x1c
github.com/rclone/rclone/lib/pacer.(*Pacer).call(0x357ab40, 0x397e3f0, 0x1)
	github.com/rclone/rclone/lib/pacer/pacer.go:197 +0x74
github.com/rclone/rclone/lib/pacer.(*Pacer).CallNoRetry(...)
	github.com/rclone/rclone/lib/pacer/pacer.go:225
github.com/rclone/rclone/backend/azureblob.(*Object).Update(0x3695d10, {0x180d580, 0x36f0f00}, {0x17f501c, 0x351efd0}, {0xa6be9410, 0x3778580}, {0x3605188, 0x1, 0x1})
	github.com/rclone/rclone/backend/azureblob/azureblob.go:1677 +0x758
github.com/rclone/rclone/backend/azureblob.(*Fs).Put(0x3693180, {0x180d580, 0x36f0f00}, {0x17f501c, 0x351efd0}, {0xa6be9410, 0x3778580}, {0x3605188, 0x1, 0x1})
	github.com/rclone/rclone/backend/azureblob/azureblob.go:1110 +0xf8
github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/operations.Copy({0x180d580, 0x36f0f00}, {0x182e48c, 0x3693180}, {0x0, 0x0}, {0x35ec2ca, 0x5}, {0x182ee64, 0x3778580})
	github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/operations/operations.go:472 +0x19ac
github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/sync.(*syncCopyMove).pairCopyOrMove(0x368eb40, {0x180d580, 0x36f0f00}, 0x36f0c30, {0x182e48c, 0x3693180}, 0x0, 0x368ebd8)
	github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/sync/sync.go:402 +0x188
created by github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/sync.(*syncCopyMove).startTransfers
	github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/sync/sync.go:429 +0xcc
```

#### How to use GitHub

* Please use the üëç [reaction](https://blog.github.com/2016-03-10-add-reactions-to-pull-requests-issues-and-comments/) to show that you are affected by the same issue.
* Please don't comment if you have no relevant information to add. It's just extra noise for everyone subscribed to this issue.
* Subscribe to receive notifications on status change and new comments.
